activities: market research: primarily online surveys and in-person and online focus groups. we collect self reported data in survey which typically include demographic information such as gender, age, race, income, etc. as well as the person’s name, address and contact info such as telephone and/or email. We never report this data in a way that it could be tied to an individual survey participant – it is usually used in aggregate to classify respondents into subgroups or to look differences btwn various demographic segments in a given study.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: market research survey participant data, our client's CUSTOMER data when they provide us customer lists for the purpose of contacting them to participate in survey research
recoursemech: MINDWAVE RESEARCH has committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the Safe Harbor Principles to an independent dispute resolution mechanism, the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus. If you do not receive timely acknowledgment of your complaint, or if your complaint is not satisfactorily addressed by MINDWAVE RESEARCH, you may contact BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints.
